24428.<pc>は 立て札を読んだ。\nしかし こちらは 裏側だった！\n<end>:

26166.<left>この先の一帯は 屈強な魔物の生息地なり。\n<left>決して 油断:
<left>Area ahead is a habitat for powerful monsters.
<left>Never let your guard down.

<bw_clear>
↑ Kami...mui Castle Palace

26268.<center>↑知恵の社\n<left>←キリカ草原\n<right>ツスクル:
↑ Shrine of Wisdom
← Kirika Steppe
→ Tsusukul Village

26269.<left>橋を３つ渡って 東へ行くと 久遠の森。\n<left>道なりに西へ行:
Cross 3 bridges and go east to reach the
Forest of Eternity. Follow the road west to
reach the Kirika Steppe.

26270.<left>遠くに見える ひときわ大きい木が\n<left>我ら エルフと共に生:
The large tree in the distance is Yggdrasil,
which lives with the elves.

26272.<left>光の河を渡った先 キリカ草原。: <left>Across the River of Light is Kirika Steppe.

26275.<left>←ツスクルの村\n<right>キリカ草原→\n<center>知恵:
← Tsusukul Village
→ Kirika Steppe
↓ Shrine of Wisdom

26768.<left>スイゼン湿原は 豊かな水に育まれた\n<left>大自然の宝庫ですが:
Suizen Marsh is a treasure trove of nature,
nurtured by rich water and abundance of food,
but also a dangerous area where monsters live.

26769.<left>行き止まりでも 見にいかずにはいられない。\n<left>あなたは:
Even if it's a dead end, you can't help but go
take a look. You are the true reflection
of travelers!

26770.<left>←アズラン地方\n<right>道なり スイの塔→:
← Azlan Region
→ Road to Sui Tower

26771.<left>←北の橋の先 道なり アズラン地方\n<left>←西の橋の先 道な:
← North of bridge is road to Azlan Region
← West of bridge is road to Inamino Highway
→ Road to Sui Tower

26772.<left>この先 許可のない者は\n<left>立ち入るべからず。:
<left>No unauthorized persons are allowed to enter
<left>this area.

26773.<left>スイの塔に 巡礼される方へ。\n<left>この一帯は 毒やマヒをも:
To those making a pilgrimage to Sui Tower.
The area is inhabited by many poisonous and
paralyzing monsters, so proceed with caution.

26775.<left>この先 より強い魔物たちが\n<left>生息しています。ご注意を！:
<left>There are more powerful monsters in the area
<left>ahead. Beware!

26777.<left>遠くに見える スイの塔は\n<left>アストルティア最古の木造建築:
<left>The Sui Tower, seen in the distance, is said
<left>to be the oldest wooden structure in Astoltia.

26778.<left>この先 行き止まりです。\n<left>本当に 行き止まりです。:
<left>Dead end ahead.
<left>It's really a dead end.

27040.<left>この先 虹鏡の湖\n<left>凶悪な魔物がいるので 注意すること。:
<left>Rainbow Mirror Lake ahead.
<left>Be careful, there are vicious monsters.

27079.<center>↑道なり アズラン地方\n<left>←山間の関所 カミハルムイ:
↑ Road to Azlan Region
← Mountain Pass, Kamiharmui South
↓ Suizen Marsh

27080.<left>西に向かうと山間の関所。\n<left>南にいる魔物は 凶暴につき:
<left>To the west is the Mountain Pass.
<left>The monsters in the south are vicious, beware!

27081.<left>西に向かうと山間の関所。\n<left>南にいる魔物は 凶暴につき:
<left>To the west is the Mountain Pass.
<left>The monsters in the south are vicious, beware!

27082.<left>この先 まわり道。\n<left>カミハルムイ領南へ 向かうなら\n:
Detour ahead.
If you are heading to Kamiharmui South, it's
safer to follow the road.

27084.<left>この辺りの岩には 魔除けの効果を持つ\n<left>破魔のヒスイが:
The rocks around here are supposed to ward off
evil. They are filled with Devil's Jade.

27085.<center>↑スイゼン湿原\n<right>山間の関所 カミハルムイ領南→\:
↑ Suizen Marsh
→ Mountain Pass, Kamiharmui South
↓ Road to Azlan Region

27086.<left>北に向かうとスイゼン湿原。\n<left>南にいる魔物は 凶暴につき:
<left>To the north is Suizen Marsh.
<left>The monsters in the south are vicious, beware!

27087.<left>東に向かうとスイゼン湿原。\n<left>南にいる魔物は 凶暴につき:
<left>To the east is Suizen Marsh.
<left>The monsters in the south are vicious, beware!

27104.<left>古い立て札に\n<left>かすれた文字が 書かれている。\n<bw:
It's an old sign with faint writing on it.
<bw_clear>
On th. ...er side of t.. .ridge is Kamiha...i
Castle.

27105.<left>棄てられた城 に行くならば\n<left>大樹の影を 追うべし。:
If you are going to the abandoned castle,
follow the shadow of the great tree.

27194.<center>↑木かげの集落\n<right>イナミノ街道 スイの塔→\n<c:
↑ Treeshade Village
→ Inamino Highway, Sui Tower
↓ Wind Town Azlan

27195.<center>↑木かげの集落\n<left>←風泣き岬\n<center>風の:
↑ Treeshade Village
← Windy Cape
↓ Wind Town Azlan

27197.<left>この先 凶悪な魔物どもの息づく\n<left>未開の領地につき 立ち:
Vicious monsters inhabit the area ahead.
No one may enter this uncivilized territory.
～ Azlan Lord, Taketora

27199.<left>木かげの集落に ようこそ。\n<left>道なりに進むと 風の町アズ:
<left>Welcome to Treeshade Village.
<left>Follow the road to Wind Town Azlan.

27202.<center>↑風の町アズラン\n<left>←イナミノ街道 スイの塔\n<c:
↑ Wind Town Azlan
← Inamino Highway, Sui Tower
↓ Treeshade Village

27203.<left>←風の町アズラン\n<right>風泣き岬→\n<center>木か:
← Wind Town Azlan
→ Windy Cape
↓ Treeshade Village

27207.<center>↑王都カミハルムイ南\n<center>テテリ渓谷（封鎖中）↓:
↑ Kamiharmui City South
↓ Teteri Valley (Under Blockade)

27208.<left>スイレンの葉が 沈んでしまいますので\n<left>池に 飛び込んだ:
Please do not jump or swim in the pond as the
water lily leaves will sink.

27210.<left>←イナミノ街道\n<right>道なり カミハルムイ領北→:
← Inamino Highway
→ Road to Kamiharmui North

27211.<left>この先 強き魔物多し。\n<left>ウデに自信のないものは\n<l:
There are many strong monsters ahead.
Do not cross this bridge if you are not
confident in your skill.

27212.<left>南に進むと この辺りで見れる桜のうち\n<left>樹齢が 最も長い:
If you go south, you'll see the best cherry
blossoms from some of the oldest cherry trees
in the world.

27214.<center>↑テテリ渓谷（封鎖中）\n<center>王都カミハルムイ南↓:
↑ Teteri Valley (Under Blockade)
↓ Kamiharmui City South

27215.<left>破魔のヒスイは 魔を遠ざける。\n<left>キズつき 疲れたときは:
The Devil's Jade keeps the monsters away.
When you are worn out, you must rely on the
Devil's Jade.

27475.<left>引きかえせ！\n<left>命が おしけりゃ 立ち入るべからず:
Turn back!
Do not enter if you want to live.

28348.<center>↑風泣き岬\n<right>木かげの集落 キリカ草原→:
↑ Windy Cape
→ Treeshade Village, Kirika Steppe

28501.<left>←王都カミハルムイ 北門\n<right>夢幻の森→:
← Kamiharmui City Northern Gate
→ Dream Forest

28507.<left>この先 危険地帯！\n<left>どうしても進む場合は 準備を万全に:
<left>Dangerous area ahead!
<left>Make sure you are prepared.

28508.<center>↑カミハルムイ領南\n<left>←王都カミハルムイ 北門\n<:
↑ Kamiharmui South
← Kamiharmui City Northern Gate
→ Sunset Meadow

28509.<left>←夢幻の森\n<right>王都カミハルムイ 北門→\n<cente:
← Dream Forest

28510.<center>↑イムイ地下空洞\n<left>←落陽の草原\n<right>王:
↑ Imui Underground Cave
← Sunset Meadow
→ Kamiharmui Northern Gate

28553.<left>この階段の先 領主タケトラの屋敷:
At the top of the stairs is Lord Taketora's
mansion.

29449.<left>桜に関することが 書いてあるようだが\n<left>文字がかすれて:
It seems to be something about cherry
blossoms, but the words were too faint to
read.

31714.<pc>は 掲示板を読んだ。\nしかし こちらは 裏側だった！:
You tried to read the bulletin board.
But you're standing on the wrong side!

32635.<pc>は 看板を読んだ。\nしかし こちらは 裏側だった！\n<end>:
You tried to read the sign.
But you're standing on the wrong side!
<end>

32640.<left>家具屋の 看板だ。: It's an indoor furniture shop sign.

32667.<left>家具屋の 看板だ。: It's an indoor furniture shop sign.

44545.<left>幼き日の ニコロイ王と\n<left>家族が描かれた 肖像画だ。\n:
It's a portrait of King Nikoroi as a child
with his family.
Everyone was smiling happily.

44585.<left>黒板には 高度な呪文に関する 難解な論文が\n<left>たくさん貼:
The blackboard seems to be filled with arcane treatises on advanced spells.
You stopped reading because your head started to hurt just jooking at it!

45515.<left>戦いの日々に疲れた そこのあなた。\n<left>宿屋の地下にわきで:
If you are weary from everyday battles.
Please soak in the hot spring water in the
basement of the inn to soothe your tired body.

45516.<left>町の中にいる カムシカたちは\n<left>アズランの住民が 大切に:
The Azlantelope in the town are carefully
cared for by the residents of Azlan. Please do
not give them treats without permission.

45517.<left>この駅は はるか昔の木造建築です。\n<left>アズランへ吹く風が:
This station is a wooden structure from long
ago. The wind that blows into Azlan draws away
moisture to keep it from decaying over time.

45518.<left>風の町アズランへ おいでませ。\n<left>心地よい そよ風に吹か:
Welcome to Wind Town Azlan.
Please relax and enjoy the pleasant breeze.

45519.<center>魔瘴注意！\n<left>都の北には 呪われた大地があり\n<l:
Miasma Warning!
To the north of the city lies the Cursed Land,
which is always covered with miasma.

45520.<center>木製の武器や 家具を作ってみませんか？\n<center>木工ギ:
Want to make wooden weapons or furniture?
The Woodworking Guild welcomes all newcomers!
～ Woodworking Guild Headquarters

45521.<left>おいでませ 王都カミハルムイへ。\n<left>ここは 散ることをし:
Welcome to Kamiharmui City.
A city of everlasting spring, decorated
with cherry blossoms that never fall.

45522.<left>旅の記念に お茶を たしなみませんか？\n<left>茶の心は エル:
Want a cup of tea to commemorate your journey?
The heart of tea is the heart of an elf.
～ Tea Ceremony Federation

45523.<center>忘れ物リスト\n<left>雨ガサ ８本 みやびな茶碗 １個\n:
Lost and Found List
8 umbrellas, 1 elegant teacup,
1 copy of "Always Pass New Trials" book.

49035.<Center>温泉を利用するお客さまへ \n<Left>作業員が そうじに入る:
To customers using the hot springs
Please note that workers may enter to clean.
Thank you for your understanding.

68422.<left>大きな光球は 冷たい光を放っている。: <left>The large glowing ball emits a cold light.

68423.<left>大きな光球は 冷たい光を放っている。: <left>The large glowing ball emits a cold light.

318052.<left>この先私有地につき入れません: Private Property. No entry beyond this point.
